text: {{Infobox settlement | name = | settlement_type = Canton | image_shield = Wappen Basel-Stadt matt.svg | shield_size = 80x80px | shield_link = | image_map = | map_alt = Map of Switzerland, location of Basel-Stadt highlighted | map_caption = Location in Switzerland | coordinates = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Basel | parts_type = Subdivisions | parts_style = para | p1 = 3 municipalities | p2 = | leader_title = Executive | leader_name = Executive Council (7) | leader_title1 = Legislative | leader_name1 = Grand Council (100) | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = auto | iso_code = CH-BS | blank_name_sec1 = Highest point | blank_info_sec1 = : St. Chrischona | blank1_name_sec1 = Lowest point | blank1_info_sec1 = : Rhine shore, national border at | blank_name_sec2 = Joined | blank_info_sec2 = 1501 | blank1_name_sec2 = Languages | blank1_info_sec2 = German | website = }} Basel-Stadt is one of the 26 cantons of Switzerland. The capital is Basel. It is the smallest canton by area. == Municipalities == There are three municipalities: Municipality Population () Area Basel Bettingen Riehen == References == == Other websites == * * Official statistics *
